name: Rock Fall (Hebdogiciel)
overview: Despite the certain threat posed by unstable scree, try to recover the diamonds buried in a disused mine. This game was apparently a ROM hack of the original version with the same name created in 1991 and later published in Italy, this French version had added levels created by Maxime Frenot and had some color changes and even modifications to the layout of the existing levels that change how they must be solved. It was published by Hebdogiciel in both Hebdogiciel Hors Serie N°2, and Hebdogiciel Software N°5.
